heading: HR01758
0: A RESOLUTION SEEKING TO RECTIFY THE UNLAWFUL APPOINTMENT OF CESAR GILBERT ADRIANO AS DIRECTOR OF THE NATIONAL LIBRARY OF THE PHILIPPINES LAST MARCH 2017 IN VIOLATION OF ARTICLE IV, SECTION 31 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9246 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE PHILIPPINE LIBRARIANSHIP ACT OF 2003

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01758
